actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Hearings held.

official_title: A joint resolution providing for congressional disapproval of the rule submitted by the Department of Energy relating to the postponement of the effective date of energy conservation standards for central air conditioners.

summary.text: Declares that: (1) Congress disapproves the rule submitted by the Department of Energy relating to the postponement of the effective date of energy conservation standards for central air conditioners (published at 66 Fed. Reg. 20191 (2001)); and (2) such rule shall have no force or effect.

titles.title: A joint resolution providing for congressional disapproval of the rule submitted by the Department of Energy relating to the postponement of the effective date of energy conservation standards for central air conditioners.
